Running CockroachDB on Kubernetes
description: Since this post was originally published in 2017, StatefulSets have become common and allow a wide array of stateful workloads to run on Kubernetes. In this post, we’ll quickly walk through the history of StatefulSets, and how they fit with CockroachDB and Kubernetes, before jumping into a tutorial for running CockroachDB on Kubernetes. -– Managing resilience, scale, and ease of operations in a containerized world is largely what Kubernetes is all about—and one of the reasons platform adoption has doubled since 2017.
